Comprehensive Overview: CCL (Cpp Command Line Library) is a C++ library targeting Unix platform that makes it easy to define and parse command line arguments. It provides a simple and intuitive way to define and parse command-line arguments for C++ programs.
Core Features: 1. Easy definition of command line arguments with strong typing. 2. Automatic generation of help messages. 3. Support for positional arguments, switches, and flags. 4. No external dependencies.
